TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DownloadProgressChangedEventHandler(object sender, DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DownloadProgressChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DownloadProgressChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void DownloadProgressChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type DownloadProgressChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs -> unit

summary.span: 代表將處理 之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). [處理和引發事件Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md) > [!NOTE] > 如果伺服器不會傳送下載的檔案 （例如被動 FTP 連線的情況下），大小可能一律為零。If the server does not send the size of the downloaded file (such as in the case of a passive FTP connection), may always be zero. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定事件處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for the event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#19)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#19)]
